hypothesis_content.title: Intraday VWAP Fade on Low Regime Confidence
hypothesis_content.statement: On days where the daily regime classification confidence is LOW (<55%), a sharp intraday move in BTC (4-hour candle > 1.5x the 10-day average 4H range) that pushes price >1.8% away from the daily Volume-Weighted Average Price (VWAP) will revert toward the VWAP before the daily close with >70% probability.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Low regime confidence indicates a confused, transitional, or low-conviction market. Large moves in such environments are often driven by liquidity gaps or overreaction to noise, not sustained fundamentals. The VWAP acts as a powerful magnet for intraday price as it represents the 'average traded price' for the session.
entry_conditions: Entry on close of the triggering 4H candle

exit_conditions.take_profit: Price returns to within 0.3% of the daily VWAP
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price moves an additional 1% away from the VWAP

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Success rate (TP hit before SL or close) is below 60% when tested across at least 50 independent low-confidence days.
